Ctrl + b = Show / Hide the Sidebar
Ctrl + ~ = Show / Hide the terminal 
Ctrl + p = Opens search bar to search files
Ctrl + Arrow (Up / Down) = Scrolls Up or Down with keyboard
Ctrl + p, then @ = Navigate through symbols
Ctrl + \ = Split the editor
Ctrl + w = Close the Split editor
Ctrl + enter = Create a new line even though you're already on a line
Ctrl + Shift + l = Selects a word and replaces it
Ctrl +  Shift + d = Selects a word line by line
